title: RAK12013 WisBlock Radar Sensor Module > RAK12013 WisBlock Radar Sensor Module > Product Description > RAK12013 3.2GHz Microwave Radar Module Overview
content:
RAK12013 is a 3.2GHz microwave radar module based on RCWL-9196. It uses the Doppler radar effect to detect moving objects/motion using microwaves. The RCWL-9196 will transmit and receive a 3.2GHz radar signal and compare the difference between the two signals to determine whether the object is moving or not.  
> **TIP:** NOTE
parent_content:
RAK12013 is a 3.2GHz microwave radar module based on RCWL-9196. It uses the Doppler radar effect to detect moving objects/motion using microwaves. The RCWL-9196 will transmit and receive a 3.2GHz radar signal and compare the difference between the two signals to determine whether the object is moving or not.  
> **TIP:** NOTE
1. Radar signals don't interfere with other signals such as LoRa, WiFi, and Bluetooth; but multiple radar signals interfere with each other between single individuals over a distance greater than 1 meter.
2. The component side of the PCB module is the positive sensing face, while the opposite side is the negative sensing face. The negative sensing face is less effective in terms of sensing.

RAK12013 is a 3.2GHz microwave radar module based on RCWL-9196. It uses the Doppler radar effect to detect moving objects/motion using microwaves. The RCWL-9196 will transmit and receive a 3.2GHz radar signal and compare the difference between the two signals to determine whether the object is moving or not.

2. The component side of the PCB module is the positive sensing face, while the opposite side is the negative sensing face. The negative sensing face is less effective in terms of sensing.

title: RAK12013 WisBlock Radar Sensor Module > RAK12013 WisBlock Radar Sensor Module > Prerequisites > RAK12013 Module Requirements and Setup
content:
To use a **RAK12013**, you need at least a **WisBlock Base** to plug the module in. **WisBlock Base** provides power supply to the **RAK12013** module. Furthermore, you need a **WisBlock Core** module to use the sensor.  
> **WARNING:** Make sure to fix the module with the screws to ensure a proper function.
parent_content:
To use a **RAK12013**, you need at least a **WisBlock Base** to plug the module in. **WisBlock Base** provides power supply to the **RAK12013** module. Furthermore, you need a **WisBlock Core** module to use the sensor.  
> **WARNING:** Make sure to fix the module with the screws to ensure a proper function.
